About the only reason I could possibly care about the trial of Superfreak Jackson is to wonder when some worthwhile story will takes its place in the headlines.
 
 Guilty or not, he's a freak...by his own doing!
I care only in the sense that justice needs to be done, period.

Time for one of my fearless predictions. Not that I care.
 
 He'll be acquited of the more serious charges, but will be found guilty of some of the lesser ones, such as supplying liquor to a minor. 
 
 My wife has maintained from the beginning that if he were found guilty of molestation, he would commit suicide. She thinks he's squirreling pills away from the doctor's visits over his fake back problems.

I voted "don't care." That does not mean I'm completely uninterested. It's a current event, and so I keep up on it, but not by watching it on Court T.V. all day long. This whole thing and most everyone involved is bizarre.
 
 
He'll be acquited of the more serious charges, but will be found guilty of some of the lesser ones, such as supplying liquor to a minor. 
 

 
 I agree.
What would interest me is if he is aquitted in his criminal trial but were then to lose a civil case over the same offense to the plantiffs, OJ Simpson murdering Nicole Simpson/Ron Goldman style.

What would interest me is if he is aquitted in his criminal trial but were then to lose a civil case over the same offense to the plantiffs, OJ Simpson murdering Nicole Simpson/Ron Goldman style.
He would likely pay up rather than have a judgment against him. He's already done that at least once before.
 
 However, as I understand it right now, he's severely in debt at present and may lose Neverland to pay the bills.
I voted care but im not a huge suppproter or fan I just believe that didn't do it.
